text: “Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨgei: Akar kamɨn mɨngarim a kamakɨn. Babilon ia gativagh ian ganasa, kɨ 70plan azenibagh inaba. Eghtɨ azenir kaba gɨvaghtɨma Babilon ikuvigham. Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn kɨ ia ginɨrɨgh, ua ian aku Jerusalemɨn izam, kar kɨ uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨva a damuam.
